text: The term triangular coordinates may refer to any of at least three related systems of coordinates in the Euclidean plane: * a special case of barycentric coordinates for a triangle, in which case it is known as a ternary plot or areal coordinates, among other names, * trilinear coordinates, in which the coordinates of a point in a triangle are its relative distances from the three sides, * synergetics coordinates Category:Triangle geometry Category:Coordinate systems
title: Triangular coordinates
